title: [Large-Scale] Student Engagement Enhancement Program Utilizing Cinematic Meditation and Online Books

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and understanding of video media
context.additional_context: Applying innovative pedagogical methods to enhance learner motivation and academic achievement. A participatory blended design combining in-person and remote activities

learning_goals: Students improve their critical thinking skills regarding technological advancements by over 20% through cinematic meditation activities
Learners generate self-directed learning records at least twice a week using an online book platform
At the end of the educational program, over 80% of learners meet the benchmarks for goal orientation and diligence in essay evaluations
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
